body:
Thanks for the pull request but I am a bit skeptical about merging this. Some reasons:

1) Support between different browsers is still unstable. The behavior changes a lot and you have poor customization.
2) If we are supporting this feature, it needs to be opt-in because it is backwards incompatible. Many integration tests through selenium would fail for example.
3) ActionView::Helpers and ActiveResource are the worst (in terms of legacy) Rails code. I would strongly suggest cleaning up the house before adding more features.
4) I believe those Rails form helpers have always intended to be low level. I am skeptical about adding more features, if we are going down this path, I would suggest creating a new form builder inside Rails that inherits from the base one in order to add HTML5 features. For now, I would move such behavior to plugins (as SimpleForm and Formtastic) as you did.
